Business Development Officer Job at Grace Moni Limited




        
    

        
        Grace Moni Limited is a financial services provider at the nexus of technology and professional financial services in Africa. We were birthed to address a gap in financial inclusion, in line with the Maya Declaration; a global initiative for responsible and sustainable financial inclusion that aims to reduce poverty and ensure financial stability for the benefit of all.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Officer

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Identify and engage prospective clients for company financial service offerings
	Build and maintain professional relationships with individuals and partner organizations
	Promote company products through approved marketing and business development activities
	Follow up on leads and ensure proper onboarding of clients
	Prepare and submit periodic activity and performance reports
	Work in line with company policies and regulatory guidelines.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / BSc in any discipline
	Previous experience in sales, marketing, or business development is an added advantage
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work independently and meet assigned objectives
	High level of professionalism and integrity.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Hr@gracemonilimited.com using "Application – Business Development Officer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more enquiries, call 07072555600.
